full_summary:
**T3033-2324TC-B Flex-wing Rotary Cutter**

Reference Number: WS3530595694
Solicitation Number: WS3530595694-AM-2
Tender Status: Expired

**Notice Details**

Type of Contract: Request for Proposal
Method of Tender: Competitive - Open bidding
Procedure Type: Goods
UNSPSC Class: 21102000 - Agricultural machinery for cleaning and sorting and grading
Goods Description: Flex-wing rotary cutter for trimming grass in airport service areas.
Countries Served: Canada

Bidding Instructions

• Bidders must submit all mandatory documents and support materials on time to ensure responsiveness.
• Due to an amendment to the closing time, please disregard the previously posted closing time on Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell posting.
• All required documents and bid submissions must be submitted on September 20, 2022, by 2:00 p.m. EDT.

Award Criteria

• Lowest price will be the criterion for award.

Performance and Service Standards
The selected bidder is expected to deliver high-quality goods, services, or works that meet the prescribed specifications within the stipulated timeframe and under the approved budget.

Bid Companion Documents

Refer to the tender notice on the Ariba Discovery platform (link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13881544?extsite=MTM4ODE1NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13881544?extsite=MTM4ODE1NDRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)) for detailed requirements and business procedures.

Key Dates
- Publication Date: August 19, 2022
- Amendment Date: September 15, 2022
- Tender Closing Date: September 20, 2022

Contract Information

Official Sellers Address
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage  
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5  
Canada
